title: Trump says Chinese delegation coming to U.S. next week for trade talks
text:
Trump says Chinese delegation coming to U.S. next week for trade talks

Forex 9 hours ago (Oct 03, 2019 10:48AM ET)

WASHINGTON (Reuters) - President Donald Trump said on Thursday a delegation from China would come to the United States next week for more trade talks. "China's coming in next week. We're going to have a meeting with them. We'll see. But we're doing very well," Trump said before leaving on a trip to Florida. "I have a lot of options on China. But if they don't do what we want, we have tremendous power," he added.

Trump says Chinese delegation coming to U.S. next week for trade talks
description: Trump says Chinese delegation coming to U.S. next week for trade talks
